name: Pranav
message: Another Great Meditation app from Himalayan Meditation. For us Indians from where meditations came, we only had English language option till now. But now Behold here we have all Authentic Meditation with Contemplations all in Hindi by which we can feel it deep within. It has many and rare meditions ...

name: Deepika Panwar
message: Such a smooth to navigate app!! Carefully designed and delineated programs offer solutions to problems faced by different types of people on a daily basis. Adi purusha is indeed a physical guide in the digital worldâ¤â¤ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

name: Priya Saini
message: While using this app I got experience like never before... Unseeable and unknowable thoughts with an extensive knowledge... That the universe doesn't exist on its own.. there is some supernatural power that governs and rules it...

name: Manisha Sharma
message: One of the best apps found. This app helped me specifically in building habit of meditation. All meditations are worth practicing. Amazing, mesmerizing experience!

name: Sagar Gupta
message: Such an unique app. It has so many unknown and new medication ideas which are wonderful. Coudn't have found any better app than this.

name: Gautam Aneja
message: It was my first experience with a meditation app and there is no looking further. I have found what I wanted.

name: Pankaj Singh
message: I had never expected that I will get such an amazing app in my life. Best meditation app ever for all hindi speaking seekers. Can't express my gratitude towards the makers. 5 stars are not worth enough.

name: Suruchi Kamble
message: The more you navigate the app, the more you realise that the realm of spirituality is an infinity. Because the goal of spirituality is to be with the infinity himself. Perfect app to reach just thatâ¤ï¸

name: Ria Tandon
message: Tvmev kevalam is the backdrop hymn playing in the app. This holds true for the app as well. This is the one!! My gratitude and respects to the developers of the app who have accumulated all the ancient authentic knowledge in one app!!

name: Namrata Tiwari
message: Really happy with the Hindi version of this app. Now I can finally recommend this app to my family members who are more comfortable in the language, adipurush it's surely a significant step towards providing guided Meditation to Hindi speaking people , . This app is a mini Gita or anywhere spiri...

name: Wiseguru
message: Distinct combination of genuine techniques and classy rendering - shakes the inner psyche and modulates the deep subconscious - transferring the inner being into a superlative metaphysical space time continuum. The link between causality and eternality. A must app to download for all aspiring medita...
